text:
The "xmltestcases\functional\proppatch\code\PropPatchDeleteDAVPropertyWithPropFi
ndOnContentLength.xml" testcase is broken on windows because the original 
filesize is larger than the hardcoded expected result of 1627. Since it is a 
text file windows adds <cr> characters to each line so the starting file size 
is 1666. The testcase will work if the uploaded file is changed from the 
current "html.html" file to a binary file like "jim.graham.gif" as its size is 
the same for unix and windows. Patch that does this is attached.
creator: wburrows@e2open.com

text:
Created attachment 13621
Changed test case to use binary file
creator: wburrows@e2open.com
